file.name: passenger-info.v1.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: passenger-info
  version: '1.0'
  description: This API gives information about load on trains and possible disturbances around operation.
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:3000'
paths:
  /routes:
    get:
      summary: calculateRoutes
      tags:
       - 'routes'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties: {}
      description: Calculate routes based on start and end point
      parameters:
        - name: locations
          in: query
          description: ''
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: models/location.v1.yaml

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /routes: get: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "locations": schema: parse schema: item: parse schema: reference "models/location.v1.yaml": resolve reference "models/location.v1.yaml": invalid schema reference "models/location.v1.yaml"
